desc.zh-CN: 芜湖轨道交通（Wuhu Rail Transit）是服务于中国安徽省芜湖市的城市轨道交通系统，其首条线路于2021年11月3日开通运营，使芜湖成为中国内地第49座 、安徽省第二座开通城市轨道交通的城市 。截至2021年12月，芜湖轨道交通运营线路共有2条，为芜湖轨道交通1号线、芜湖轨道交通2号线，共设置车站35座，其中高架站34座，地下站1座；芜湖轨道交通运营里程为46.2千米 。2021年，芜湖轨道交通累计客流294.4万人次，日均客流5.1万人次；2022年，芜湖轨道交通累计客流2278.3万人次；最高日客运量为2022年2月5日的19.36万人次 。
desc.en: Wuhu Rail Transit is an urban rail transit system serving Wuhu City, Anhui Province, China. Its first line was put into operation on November 3, 2021, making Wuhu the 49th city in mainland China and the second city in Anhui Province to open urban rail transit. As of December 2021, there are a total of 2 operating lines of Wuhu Rail Transit, including Wuhu Rail Transit Line 1 and Wuhu Rail Transit Line 2, with a total of 35 stations, including 34 elevated stations and 1 underground station; The operating mileage of Wuhu Rail Transit is 46.2 kilometers. In 2021, the cumulative passenger flow of Wuhu Rail Transit was 2.944 million, with an average daily passenger flow of 51000; In 2022, the cumulative passenger flow of Wuhu Rail Transit was 22.783 million; The maximum daily passenger volume is 193600 people on February 5, 2022.

updateHistory.reason: Creating a Subway Route Map for Wuhu City.
